discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
From SAM on-deman course:

"SAM Process Owner: A senior manager with the influence and authority to ensure that the SAM process is rolled out and executed correctly and consistently across the organization."

questions.question_text: By default, which persona is responsible for ensuring that the SAM program is rolled out and executed correctly and consistently across the organization?
Which role is required to create custom license metrics?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C - as per ServiceNow SAM course, the sam_admin role is required to read the custom metric script. The sam_developer role is required to create or modify a custom metric script

Selected Answer: A
Creating the custom license metric is with the Sam_admin.
Scripting the custom license metric is with the sam_developer.
its A Sam admin since the creation of license metrics specifically falls under sam admin

questions.question_text: When importing and/or manually entering software entitlement data into SAM you find that you do not have the Publisher Part Number (PPN) for several of your entitlements. What essential information is required in order for you to successfully add these entitlement records?

choices.D: Version, Edition, Platform, Purchased rights, Vendor, and Contract number
choices.B: Publisher, Product, Version, Edition, Platform, and Language
choices.A: Agreement type, Purchased rights, Product, Asset tag, and Vendor
choices.C: Publisher, Product, License type, Purchased rights, Metric group, and License metric

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Hint:
alm_license - does not offer "version" and/or "edition" - exclude answer B & D
alm_license - does not offer "vendor" - exclude answer A
alm_license - does not offer "product" - exclude answer B & C

questions.question_text: Which application or feature can be used in baseline Software Asset Management (SAM) Professional to import software usage data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer: A or D
https://www.servicenow.com/docs/bundle/yokohama-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/view-sw-usage-workspace.html

Selected Answer: D
this is for usage data. should be SCCM

questions.question_text: What methods can you use to store contract terms with your contracts? (Choose two.)

choices.E: Add a link to the contract details the Assets covered record
choices.B: Add the details in the Terms and Conditions section of the contract record
choices.A: Attach a PDF of the contract to the contract record
choices.C: Add a link m the software entitlement record to the contract details stored in another location
choices.D: Add the details in the Contract section of the software entitlement record
